summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to taxes on admission fees; expanding exemptions available to nonprofit organizations; increasing the minimum admission fee subject to such tax from Fifteen Cents ($0.15) to One Dollar and Fifty Cents ($1.50); providing for joint and several liability; repealing Sections 5.40.026, 5.40.028, and 5.40.050, and amending Sections 5.40.010, 5.40.020, 5.40.025, 5.40.040, 5.40.050, 5.40.060, 5.40.080, 5.40.085, and 5.40.090, respectively, of the Seattle Municipal Code.
